alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Gentry (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 30 at 10:38PM CDT until June 30 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR CLINTON...SOUTHEASTERN GENTRY AND DEKALB COUNTIES... At 1037 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Stanberry to 8 miles north of Maysville to near Cameron, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cameron, Plattsburg, Gower, Maysville, Stewartsville, Osborn, Clarksdale, Turney, Weatherby, Amity and Fairport. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 42 and 55. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
